properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, have mercy.
Christ, have mercy.
Lord, have mercy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Glory to God
in the highest,
and on earth
peace to people
of good will,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
we praise you,
we adore you,
we glorify you,
we give you thanks
for your great glory.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lord God, heavenly King,
O God, Almighty Father.
Lord Jesus Christ,
only Begotten son,
Lord God,
Lamb of God,

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Son of the Father,
you take away
the sins of the world,
have mercy on us;
You take away
the sins of the world,
receive our prayer;

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
You are seated
at the right hand
of the Father,
have mercy on us.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
For you alone
are Holy one,
you alone are the Lord,
you alone are
the most High,
Jesus Christ

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
with the Holy spirit,
in the glory of God
the Father.
Amen.
